lead_paragraph: WEINER--Walter H. The Yeshiva University family is deeply grieved by the passing of Walter H. Weiner, a longtime friend and supporter of Yeshiva University and its affiliated Albert Einstein College of Medicine. He was awarded a Doctor of Humane Letters from Yeshiva University in 1996 and was dedicated to advancing the University's mission. Heartfelt condolences are extended to his loving wife, Nina, his sons, Tom and Jon, his grandson, Josh, his brother, Dr. Roy Weiner, his daughter-in-law, Tracy, and the entire family. May they be comforted among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINER, WALTER H
